Author: lattesandselfhatred
Text: Yeah fuck that. My mom did the same shit when i was in the hospital. Had just found out I was being admitted after my kidneys started going out and I had a horrible horrible infection. She said “this is the best you’ve ever looked!!” i was literally dying....  I haven’t talked to her in over a year.   I’m sorry you’re hurting and I’m sorry she sucks. Hang in there. ❤️

Author: j4jackj
Text: your mum is a sick fuck. that's all
